page.title: 07Ardross: amenities
page.content:
General Being a remote rural area amenities around Ardross are extremely limited.
(1)Post Office: The post office is a house situated in a wooded area between Ardross and Ardross Mains. It is run by an old lady who has a dog: she speaks some Gaelic. There are 6 or 7 old age pensioners who visit the post office. No-one claims maternity allowance,widow's allowance, disability payment and no giros are paid out at present: 6 family allowances are paid here. There used to be a shop at the post office but this closed in 1983.
